p: Since the publication of “Reflection Paper on the Adaptogenic Concept,” an enormous number of studies that significantly enrich the current knowledge of the pharmacology, clinical efficacy, and mechanisms of action of adaptogens have been published. The term adaptogens has been used in numerous publications indexed in PubMed that clearly show that the statement “as such, the term is not accepted in pharmacological and clinical terminology that is commonly used in the EU” is now far from reality.
